game.name: Mirklurk: Every Step Matters
game.shortDescription: You have been exiled to The Mirk - an unforgiving swampland where every step can be your last. You must constantly make choices: what paths to take, which tree to shelter under, what beasts to engage or avoid, what items to bring into the darkness of dungeons, and what to leave behind.
